description:
Affiliation: Maine`s Crew (formerly), David`s Crew (formerly)
Occupation: Mercenary - Nomad
Cyberware: Cyberoptics, EMP Threading, Right Cyberarm
Falco is a former Nomad wheelman who was part of Maine`s edgerunner crew. After Maine`s Crew got defunct, Falco joined David`s crew. At the end of the series, Falco became a recluse.
During the course of the series, Falco acts as the wheelman for almost all of the heists. Sometimes unhappy with the spontaneous requests of Maine`s Crew, he is still loyal and happy to work with them.
name: Falco
